results.name: Lost Below The Earth - A Horror Storytelling RPG

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 / Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 3.3 GHz or better, or AMD Ryzen 3 @ 3.1 GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 Ti, RX 460 (4GB)
  • Storage: 13 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Solid State Drive Is highly Recommended
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-Bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700K or better, or AMD Ryzen 7 1800X or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 (6GB), NVIDIA GeForce 970 (4GB), AMD RX 480 (8GB)
  • Storage: 13 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Solid State Drive Is highly Recommended

results.name: One Last Round (Brie Y. R., ssssybil, HA7Oes)
